Fire Release Exploding Flame Crater explosion.png;…and then made to explode.
|kanji=火遁・消し幕が原
|unnamed jutsu=No
|romaji=Katon: Keshimakuga Hara

|game names=Fire Style: Vanishing Attack

Jiraiya stomps the ground with his foot, creating a crack that goes under the opponent. He then sends fire into the crack, boiling the earth below the opponent and finishes by clapping his hands together, creating a large and fiery explosion where the opponent is.

[[es:Elemento Fuego: Cortina del Campo de Extinción]]
[[pt-br:Liberação de Fogo: Campo da Cortina em Extinção]]
[[pl:Katon: Keshimakuga Hara]]
